languages.text: {n}Из груди Висиря вырывается усталый вздох.{/n} "Мучительная мистерия, беспощадный ритуал... Я рад, что конец его близок. Все вершится так, как указал Он мне. Изваяно совершенство. Повержен недуг, взращенный мной. Свершен выбор... Почему же так горько, дочь?" {n}Висирь качает головой очень по-человечески, плечи его опускаются, и рука его тянется к Кибелле.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Из груди Висиря вырывается усталый вздох.{/n} "Мучительная мистерия, беспощадный ритуал... Я рад, что конец его близок. Все вершится так, как указал Он мне. Изваяно совершенство. Повержен недуг, взращенный мной. Свершен выбор... Почему же так горько, дочь?" {n}Висирь качает головой очень по-человечески, плечи его опускаются, и рука его тянется к Кибелле.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A tired sigh escapes the Vizsier's chest.{/n} "A harrowing sacrament. A ruthless ritual... I am relieved that it is nearing the end. Everything is coming together just as He revealed to me. Perfection has been sculpted. The affliction I nurtured has been vanquished. The choice has been made... So whence all the sadness, my daughter?" {n}The Vizsier shakes his head, suddenly looking very human. His shoulders droop, and he extends a hand toward Kibellah.{/n}

So whence all the sadness, my daughter?" {n}The Vizsier makes a wry and very human face. His shoulders droop, and he extends a hand toward Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un soupir las s'échappe de la poitrine du vizir.{/n} « Un sacrement douloureux. Un rituel impitoyable... Je suis soulagé d'en voir enfin le bout. Tout s'achève exactement comme Il me l'a révélé. La perfection a été sculptée. L'affliction que j'ai cultivée a été vaincue. Le choix a été fait... Alors, dites-moi, pourquoi tant de tristesse, ma fille ? » {n}Le vizir secoue la tête et subitement, il vous semble plus humain que jamais. Ses épaules s'affaissent et il tend une main vers Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tired sigh escapes the Vizsier's chest.{/n} "A harrowing sacrament. A ruthless ritual... I am relieved that it is nearing the end. Everything is coming together just as He revealed to me. Perfection has been sculpted. The affliction I nurtured has been vanquished. The choice has been made... So whence all the sadness, my daughter?" {n}The Vizsier shakes his head, suddenly looking very human. His shoulders droop, and he extends a hand toward Kibellah.{/n}

Tout s'achève exactement comme Il me l'a révélé. La perfection a été sculptée. L'affliction que j'ai cultivée a été vaincue. Le choix a été fait... Alors, dites-moi, pourquoi tant de tristesse, ma fille ? » {n}Le vizir secoue la tête et subitement, il vous semble plus humain que jamais. Ses épaules s'affaissent et il tend une main vers Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Del pecho del Visir surge un suspiro de cansancio.{/n} «Un sacramento desgarrador, un ritual despiadado... Me alivia saber que el final se avecina. Todo está saliendo como Él me reveló que saldría. La perfección, por fin esculpida. La aflicción que me encargué de criar, por fin vencida. La elección ya está hecha... Pero, ¿por qué estás tan triste, hija mía?». {n}El Visir sacude la cabeza y de repente se antoja muy humano. Baja los hombros y extiende una mano hacia Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tired sigh escapes the Vizsier's chest.{/n} "A harrowing sacrament. A ruthless ritual... I am relieved that it is nearing the end. Everything is coming together just as He revealed to me. Perfection has been sculpted. The affliction I nurtured has been vanquished. The choice has been made... So whence all the sadness, my daughter?" {n}The Vizsier shakes his head, suddenly looking very human. His shoulders droop, and he extends a hand toward Kibellah.{/n}

Todo está saliendo como Él me reveló que saldría. La perfección, por fin esculpida. La aflicción que me encargué de criar, por fin vencida. La elección ya está hecha... Pero, ¿por qué estás tan triste, hija mía?». {n}El Visir sacude la cabeza y de repente se antoja muy humano. Baja los hombros y extiende una mano hacia Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは体の奥から気力なく息を漏らす。{/n}「悲惨な聖餐。冷酷な儀式…だが、終わりに近づいていることに安堵している。すべてはあの方が私に啓示されたとおりだ。完璧に形作られていたのだよ。私が育てた苦痛は破られた。選択はなされた…それなのに、この悲しみはどこから来たんだ、娘よ？」{n}ヴィジールは首を振り、急に人間らしく見えた。肩を落とし、キベラに手を差し伸べる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tired sigh escapes the Vizsier's chest.{/n} "A harrowing sacrament. A ruthless ritual... I am relieved that it is nearing the end. Everything is coming together just as He revealed to me. Perfection has been sculpted. The affliction I nurtured has been vanquished. The choice has been made... So whence all the sadness, my daughter?" {n}The Vizsier shakes his head, suddenly looking very human. His shoulders droop, and he extends a hand toward Kibellah.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは体の奥から気力なく息を漏らす。{/n}「悲惨な聖餐。冷酷な儀式…だが、終わりに近づいていることに安堵している。すべてはあの方が私に啓示されたとおりだ。完璧に形作られていたのだよ。私が育てた苦痛は破られた。選択はなされた…それなのに、この悲しみはどこから来たんだ、娘よ？」{n}ヴィジールは首を振り、急に人間らしく見えた。肩を落とし、キベラに手を差し伸べる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一声疲惫的叹息从宿老的胸口中逸出。{/n}“这是一场痛苦的圣礼，一场残酷的仪式……不过，它终于要结束了，我也终于可以松口气了。正如祂赐予我的启示一样，一切都联结在一起，以完美无缺的方式雕刻出来。我孕育出来的痛苦已经消除了，你已经做好了抉择……既然如此，我的女儿，你为什么还是这么难过呢？”{n}宿老摇了摇头，举手投足之间突然充满了人情味。他垂下了肩膀，向绮贝菈伸出一只手。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tired sigh escapes the Vizsier's chest.{/n} "A harrowing sacrament. A ruthless ritual... I am relieved that it is nearing the end. Everything is coming together just as He revealed to me. Perfection has been sculpted. The affliction I nurtured has been vanquished. The choice has been made... So whence all the sadness, my daughter?" {n}The Vizsier shakes his head, suddenly looking very human. His shoulders droop, and he extends a hand toward Kibellah.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一声疲惫的叹息从宿老的胸口中逸出。{/n}“这是一场痛苦的圣礼，一场残酷的仪式……不过，它终于要结束了，我也终于可以松口气了。正如祂赐予我的启示一样，一切都联结在一起，以完美无缺的方式雕刻出来。我孕育出来的痛苦已经消除了，你已经做好了抉择……既然如此，我的女儿，你为什么还是这么难过呢？”{n}宿老摇了摇头，举手投足之间突然充满了人情味。他垂下了肩膀，向绮贝菈伸出一只手。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein erschöpftes Seufzen entweicht der Brust des Wesirs.{/n} "Ein grauenhaftes Sakrament. Ein gnadenloses Ritual ... Ich bin erleichtert, dass sie sich dem Ende nähert. Alles fügt sich, genau wie er es mir offenbart hat. Perfektion wurde erschaffen. Das Leiden, das ich genährt habe, ist bezwungen. Die Wahl ist getroffen ... Woher also all die Trauer, meine Tochter?" {n}Der Wesir schüttelt den Kopf und sieht plötzlich sehr menschlich aus. Seine Schultern hängen schlaff herab, und er streckt eine Hand in Richtung Kibellah aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tired sigh escapes the Vizsier's chest.{/n} "A harrowing sacrament. A ruthless ritual... I am relieved that it is nearing the end. Everything is coming together just as He revealed to me. Perfection has been sculpted. The affliction I nurtured has been vanquished. The choice has been made... So whence all the sadness, my daughter?" {n}The Vizsier shakes his head, suddenly looking very human. His shoulders droop, and he extends a hand toward Kibellah.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein erschöpftes Seufzen entweicht der Brust des Wesirs.{/n} "Ein grauenhaftes Sakrament. Ein gnadenloses Ritual ... Ich bin erleichtert, dass sie sich dem Ende nähert. Alles fügt sich, genau wie er es mir offenbart hat. Perfektion wurde erschaffen. Das Leiden, das ich genährt habe, ist bezwungen. Die Wahl ist getroffen ... Woher also all die Trauer, meine Tochter?" {n}Der Wesir schüttelt den Kopf und sieht plötzlich sehr menschlich aus. Seine Schultern hängen schlaff herab, und er streckt eine Hand in Richtung Kibellah aus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vezir'in göğsünden bitkin bir iç çekiş yayılıyor.{/n} "Yürek parçalayan bir tören, acımasız bir ayin... Sona yaklaşması, içime su serpiyor. Her şey, tıpkı O'nun bana gösterdiği gibi gerçekleşiyor. Mükemmellik şeklini aldı. Beslediğim keder mağlup oldu. Seçim yapıldı... Peki tüm bu hüsran niye kızım?" {n}Vezir, aniden pek insani görünerek başını sallıyor. Omuzları düşüyor. Ardından Kibellah'ya doğru bir elini uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A tired sigh escapes the Vizsier's chest.{/n} "A harrowing sacrament. A ruthless ritual... I am relieved that it is nearing the end. Everything is coming together just as He revealed to me. Perfection has been sculpted. The affliction I nurtured has been vanquished. The choice has been made... So whence all the sadness, my daughter?" {n}The Vizsier shakes his head, suddenly looking very human. His shoulders droop, and he extends a hand toward Kibellah.{/n}
